name: Yacht HD
description:
Yacht HD is a new dice game designed exclusively for your iPad. Players take turn rolling five dice to score big with a straight, full house, four of a kind, Yacht, or Chance combination. You may also know this game as Cheerio, Yot, Yam, Yahtzee™, or General.

Yacht HD not only has real dice rolling physics, but takes advantage of your entire ipad screen to show you how all of your dice score and your past dice rolling combinations.

Challenge your friends and family or go head to head with a clever computer player. Yacht HD also supports Solitaire play.

Graphics, sound effects, and physics bring the dice rolling action to life. Customize your game by naming your human and computer players, choosing from 16 player images, and setting each computer player's difficulty.

Try Yacht HD today!

Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.

Yahtzee™ is a registered trademark of Hasbro Inc.
